casebody.data:

v.
Scott HERMAN and Craig Cooper directly and derivatively, on behalf of Oxylife Respiratory Services, LLC, an Ohio limited company, Appellees. No. 4D17-2608 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fourth District. [March 1, 2018]

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
